msg.msgText: The local server was previously removed from the cluster.

msgExplanation.p: The cluster component of Message Gateway detected that the local cluster member was previously removed from the cluster. This error can be caused by starting a cluster member that was removed from the cluster while it was down. Alternatively, this error can also be caused if the local cluster member was removed while it was behind a network partition, and the network partition subsequently healed. The removed server can no longer be part of the cluster.

msgUserResponse.p: Disable cluster membership on the server, then restart the server. After the server starts with cluster membership disabled, it is possible, if required, to re-enable cluster membership, and restart the server again. The server will re-join the cluster as a new cluster member with a new server UID (unique identifier). If the problem persists, contact IBM Support.
